description: Factorials of nonsquarefree numbers, or A013929(n)!, (including 1).
links: Harry J. Smith, Table of n, a(n) for n = 0..100
prog: (PARI) for(n=0,38, if(issquarefree(n), n+1,print(n!)))(PARI) { n=-1; for (m=0, 10^9, if (m>0, f*=m, f=1); if (!issquarefree(m), write("b062322.txt", n++, " ", f); if (n==100, break)); ) } \\ _Harry J. Smith_, Aug 04 2009
author: Jason Earls (zevi_35711(AT)yahoo.com), Jul 05 2001
extensions: Better name from _Jon E. Schoenfield_, Aug 09 2015
